summary: At twenty, all Maria wants to do is live life to the fullest. She lives with her benevolent, but aging parents. Other characters are: Linda, her best friend, the dredger Manu, Bouboule, her... See full summary »
cast: Virginie Ledoyen|Yazid Aït|Mar Sodupe|Stomy Bugsy|Jean-François Stévenin|Karim Attia|Bruno Putzulu|Jean-Marc Thibault|Brigitte Roüan|Jean-François Gallotte|Anne Canovas|Nicolas Hamon|Jean-Paul Bonnaire|Jérôme Le Paulmier|Jean Grécault|Pierre Chevallier|Michel Trillot|Candide Sanchez|Christian Bobet|Amor Attik|Emilie Benoît|Fatiha Cheriguene|Annelise Hesme|Lucien Jean-Baptiste|Mourad Khima|Anne-Lise Sabouret|Claude Belmont|Lahidine Bemba|Catherine Benguigui|Jeremy Banster|Patricia Couvillers
title: De l'amour
